game.name: CUPIES
game.shortDescription: A 3D platformer where CU tries to reunite his clumsy friends PI and ES while navigating a world full of absurd dangers and “design choices” that test your sanity. Free, chaotic, and surprisingly challenging.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 3D platformer where CU tries to reunite his clumsy friends PI and ES while navigating a world full of absurd dangers and “design choices” that test your sanity. Free, chaotic, and surprisingly challenging.
